## New Skill Submission

**Skill Name:**
**Repository URL:**
**Category:**

### Description



### Checklist

- [ ] I have tested the install command and it works
- [ ] The description accurately reflects the skill's capabilities
- [ ] The skill is placed in the correct category
- [ ] I have read the [CONTRIBUTING](CONTRIBUTING.md) guidelines
- [ ] The entry follows the format: `- [Name](url) - Description. \`Author: @handle\``
